verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:6
verses.text: And Jonathan said to the young man that bare his armour, Come, and let us go over unto the garrison of these uncircumcised: it may be that the Lord will work for us: for there is no restraint to the Lord to save by many or by few.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:7
verses.text: And his armourbearer said unto him, Do all that is in thine heart: turn thee; behold, I am with thee according to thy heart.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:8
verses.text: Then said Jonathan, Behold, we will pass over unto these men, and we will discover ourselves unto them.
